text: 4.10 Apo 2.24, 3.6, 3.13-16 Nɨbi okok, Yislel binɨb mɨdupsek okok, takaw agebin ak nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Jisas Klays bɨ Nasalet nɨb ak nop, mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lem kumak ak pen, God gek tepayaŋ tɨkjakak agak. Bɨ anɨb ak nop ne nokom agnɨgol, bɨ tob tɨmel gak anɨb awl nop gek pɨsnep suŋ lek, aj tep gup agak.
